title: Amazon India ... It is a fair policy ?
selftext:
In one statement ,  Amazon India says GST credit is not available,  on the other hand Amazon India claims that the price is including GST.

What is true ??????    How come Amazon India is allowing sellers to sale without  GST ?    Is there a case of tax evasion ?

Just for Information I logged in Amazon as business account  with proper GST number.    

https://preview.redd.it/ho3mefi0xbgb1.png?width=769&format=png&auto=webp&s=47f6aa20a745113f62c47921e89b27d32709757a
comments: I think when a seller adds products to their inventory, they should mention the tax. If they forget or don't include it, it will show as not applicable. Not a problem in regular amazon, just business.

Pathetic warranty services of newly purchased laptop - I had dell service centre say warranty expired. In fact it was less than 6 months I purchased. 

The invoice dates and warranty service doesnt match up also.

Then I came to know. ''I orded new laptop  and recieved  used laptop.''
